author: cecilecaillol
body:
#### PR description:

This PR switches to the new Phase-2 emulators and removes the old simulations. It also fixes the PF DQM problem and adds DQM for muons.
HLT needs to switch to new objects for this PR to pass the validation tests (@trtomei )
title: [L1T] Phase-2, remove old simulation and adapt DQM
